Reviews.Title: defective right hinge breaks
Reviews.Author: Reader "Reader"
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this phone unless you want to keep replacing it. It's a great phone except for the fact that the right hinge breaks even if you never drop it. I'm on my 2nd phone and warranty's won't cover it. I give up on this phone.

Reviews.Title: Phone is locked
Reviews.Author: DARREN
Reviews.Content: The unit is "OWNED" by another carrier. When I called my carrier(NEXTEL/SPRINT) to find out why I cant text ,this is what I was told. They stated there was nothing that i can do to get this to work!!

Reviews.Title: WARNING
Reviews.Author: Renee B.
Reviews.Content: If you don't buy the card for pictures you WILL loose them all when they swap out the phone.  I only had the phone 4 months when the main screen when.  They would happily honored the warrantee but I all pictures would be lost.  There doesn't seem to be a way to save or retrieve the pictures.  I can't believe there isn't a way to get them back out w/o the main screen working. But that is what I have been told by both Motorola and Sprint.  I haven't given the phone up because the pictures I had were from a trip I waited 24 years to take. AND I'm holding out hope as I climb the chain of command.  It still works as a phone accept I can't add any new numbers or people to it.  Now it's been 6 more months and the hinge is broken too.  I'm going to go back to my old phone (i530) which still works after 5 years.  I only up graded because I decided it was time.  Boy, was I wrong.  Save yourself a headache and DO NOT BUY it.Renee B.

Reviews.Title: As Listed
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: A quick fix to problem when you lose a phone and do not have insurance on it, great they included a sim card took to my local call phone provider and was able to get it connect and activated and running

Reviews.Title: great condition.
Reviews.Author: jas
Reviews.Content: I was worry at the beginner, but I bought it any way and was very shape the phone and works great to.

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!
Reviews.Author: Dk0811
Reviews.Content: My husband has always wanted one of these phones and he recently broke his so I ordered it for him. I overdrew our account to do it so i actually payed more than it costed to get it, but our son is a special needs child and he needs a phone for emergencies, when we got the phone we were very happy with it, until I found out we can't use it! Sprint doesn't support these anymore and I can't put any other sim in it to work because its not a GSM phone! I'm very unhappy and can't believe I wasted money on this, this shouldn't even be available I buy!

Reviews.Title: Motorola Brute i680
Reviews.Author: Terri L. Munroe
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband, he works contruction and needed a sturdy phone that he didn't have to worry about and this Brute works great, he loves it, it also does so many things, he's still getting use to it.

Reviews.Title: no carrier support
Reviews.Author: Richard Hobson
Reviews.Content: i like the phone recommendations when i purchased it but after rece,d it i cannot get any support for activation. nextel is not in service and other carrier do not support this phone.this item should be remove for purchasing as a diskcontinue item.an replacement phone would be nice.

Reviews.Title: No sim card came with the phone. Please send asim card
Reviews.Author: willie m bone
Reviews.Content: If you do not send the sim card i cannot used phone, so i will have to send it back if you can send  a card

Reviews.Title: nextel phone
Reviews.Author: sun
Reviews.Content: the phone is not a refurished phone it a used phone  will never but them again nextel rugged motrola I680

Reviews.Title: Great customer service!
Reviews.Author: L. Helber
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone and when I got it the earpiece didn't work, other than that the phone condition was exactly as described. I left feedback stating that the earpiece didn't work and within an hour someone from the company had called me. They explained they were sorry and offered to ship me out another phone at no charge. All I had to do was return the defective phone in the enclosed postage paid package. Within two days I had received the replacement phone and it looks new and works perfectly! I highly recommend buying from this seller since they are very concerned with service after the sale. Thanks again for the great customer service!Purchased from:  Extreme Discounts L. A.

Reviews.Title: satisfaction 100% Guamrantee
Reviews.Author: koumea
Reviews.Content: after later mistake  on my order  Elite wireless  rapid fix it as soon as possibleand i was satisfied 100%... thank you Elite  for  product  and i enjoy every little minute.
